author: Reuters Editorial
title: TABLE-Foreign trading in Japan stocks for latest week
text:
TOKYO, April 19 (Reuters) - Weekly net trading in shares on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange, Japanâ€™s main stock exchange, in thousands of yen. A negative figure indicates net selling.
